text: "Piano Man" is a 1973 song by Billy Joel. It is the title track from his second studio album Piano Man. It went to number 10 in Canada, number 14 in New Zealand, number 20 in Australia, number 25 in the United States, number 56 in the Netherlands and number 83 in Ireland. == Track listing == === 7" US single (1973) === # "Piano Man" – 4:30 # "You're My Home" – 3:08 ==References== Category:1973 songs Category:1970s ballads Category:Billy Joel songs Category:Folk rock songs Category:Soft rock songs
title: Piano Man (song)
